meanings.definition: A sleeveless garment worn under a shirt.
meanings.sent1: She wore a soft undervest to keep warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The white undervests were neatly folded in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The undervest peeked out from under his collar comically.
meanings.sent4: Her undervest was like a cozy hug against the cold.
meanings.sent5: The undervest felt snug and comforting against her skin.

meanings.definition: To wear an undervest under a shirt for added warmth.
meanings.sent1: He undervests every day to stay cozy during the chilly season.
meanings.sent2: They undervest under their work attire for extra insulation.
meanings.sent3: She undervests even in summer, just in case of a sudden breeze.
meanings.sent4: Undervesting is his secret to staying warm without bulky layers.
meanings.sent5: Undervesting is like giving yourself a warm hug throughout the day.
